directions: Mix sour cream, lemon juice, and dill together in a bowl. Add cucumbers and onion; stir to combine. Season with salt and black pepper.
ingredients: 1/2 cup reduced-fat sour cream (such as Daisy®)
3 cucumbers, halved lengthwise and thinly sliced crosswise
coarse salt and ground black pepper to taste
title: Nina's Cucumber Salad
